text: Marian Gerard Jochman (2 February 1935 – 27 December 2020) was a Polish long- distance runner. He competed in the men's 5000 metres at the 1960 Summer Olympics. Jochman died on 27 December 2020 at the age of 85.W wieku 85 lat zmarł Marian Jochman . Oficjalna strona Zawiszy Bydgoszcz.
